name: Korg Pitchblack Mini Pedal Tuner (Limited Edition Purple)
details:
TunerStyled in a limited edition purple, the Pitchblack Mini from Korg is a professional pedal tuner for the gigging musician. Despite the pedal's mini size, the display features a large 7-segment color LED, a large note indicator, and a smooth-moving meter indicator to provide excellent visibility on the darkest stages. Additionally, the Pitchblack Mini includes stabilizers to prevent the pedal from overturning.
The pedal supports battery operation, which further expands its mobile application and flexibility. It can also be integrated into a pedalboard with 9 VDC power supplies designed for effect units. The true bypass allows the signal of your instrument to pass through without affecting the sound. The Pitchblack Mini ships with two CR2032 Lithium batteries.
Mini size for easy installation in your effect board
Large high-visibility display with easily readable note-name indication
Battery operation is supported
Stabilizers prevent overturning
Three meter display including Regular, Strobe, and Half-Strobe modes
Ultra-high tuning accuracy of +/- 0.1 cents
Adjustable calibration
True bypass has absolutely no effect on the sound

https://www.korg.com/sg/products/tuners/pitchblack_mini_color/
